Question: Onboard his Star Destroyer, this person telepathically tells Luke that it is his destiny to join the dark side.
Hints: This person kills Obi-Wan in a lightsaber duel and escapes the Death Star's destruction during the film's climactic battle scene.
The news of her death breaks what remains of this person's spirit, and he screams in torment.
Premiere magazine also ranked this person on their list of The 100 Greatest Movie Characters of All Time.
